info.description: Vocabulary management and SRS (Spaced Repetition System) service for Polyfy language learning platform
info.title: Polyfy Vocabulary Service API

get.description: Get paginated list of user's vocabulary words

post.description: Add a new vocabulary word to user's collection
Add multiple vocabulary words in a single operation
Delete multiple vocabulary words in a single operation
Reset SRS progress for multiple vocabulary words in a single operation

get.description: Export user's vocabulary words in various formats (JSON, CSV)

post.description: Filter vocabulary words using advanced criteria and filters
Import vocabulary words from external sources or files

get.description: Get all vocabulary lists for the user, optionally filtered by language

post.description: Create a new vocabulary list for organizing words

get.description: Get a specific vocabulary list with its words

put.description: Update an existing vocabulary list's metadata and settings

delete.description: Delete an existing vocabulary list and optionally its associated words

get.description: Get vocabulary learning progress over time with analytics
Get vocabulary words that are due for SRS review

post.description: Submit a review for a vocabulary word using SRS algorithm
Submit multiple vocabulary reviews in a single request

get.description: Search vocabulary words by term in word, definition, or notes
Get current Spaced Repetition System configuration for the user

put.description: Update Spaced Repetition System configuration with custom parameters
Apply a predefined SRS configuration preset (beginner, intermediate, advanced)

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics for user's vocabulary in a specific language

delete.description: Delete an existing vocabulary word from user's collection

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
